Detailed Description

Dropzone Game.

Author:
Jeffrey Cusato
Date:
2011
Version:
1.0

Dropzone is a stupid game I made in spare time in an attempt to learn python and all the fun things that do with it.

I grabbed a menu class from some dude to make moving through the dialogs much easier.

Have fun playing!

Copyright 2011 Jeffrey Cusato
